english.segment1: I need you to show me how, You would do this for me. Search me in and search me out, Tell me everything.
english.segment2: Lead the way, keep us straight, Put to bed listening, Come on down and show me how, You would do this for me.
english.segment3: The greater you know yourself, The more darkness you've missed, Just to burn a tree somehow.
english.segment4: Get it out, get it out, get it out right now, While you still can, while you still can. Get it out, get it out, out right now, While you still can, while you still can.
english.segment5: I will, I will trust only your hand, To get it out, get it out, out right now, While you still can, while you still can.
english.segment6: I can't ride away and I'm worried, There are things inside of me. I can't heal when I'm hurried, These things are not mean.
english.segment7: I can't pray when I'm proud, I need you to speak so loudly, indeed.
english.segment8: The greater you know yourself, The more darkness you've missed, Just to burn a tree somehow.
english.segment9: Get it out, get it out, get it out right now, While you still can, while you still can. Get it out, get it out, out right now, While you still can, while you still can.
english.segment10: I will, I will trust only your hand, To get it out, get it out, out right now, While you still can, while you still can.
english.segment11: You're body cut out what's left of me, That I'm horny?? Cause you've still got a hold on me, You're body cut out what's left of me, That I'm horny?? Cause you've still got a hold on me.
english.segment12: (The greater you know yourself, The more darkness you've missed, Just to burn a tree somehow.)
english.segment13: Get it out, get it out, get it out right now, While you still can, while you still can. Get it out, get it out, out right now, While you still can, while you still can.
english.segment14: I will, I will trust only your hand, To get it out, get it out, out right now, While you still can, while you still can.
